name: 攻击
note:
1 号技能会在选择“攻击”指令时使用。

<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

<target action>
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
move user: targets, front, 20
else
perform start
end
wait for movement
motion attack: user

attack animation: target
wait for animation
action effect
</target action>

description:
基因锁·一阶
觉醒了脚上的力量，你的脚变得奇臭无比
name: 骑士踢
note:
<setup action>
animation 120: user
if user.friendsUnit().aliveMembers()[0].isStateAffected(445)&&user.friendsUnit().aliveMembers()[0]!=user
animation 120: friend 0
end
display action
wait: 30
immortal: targets, true
hide battle hud
wait: 5
</setup action>

<target action>
camera focus: target, front, 20
zoom: 120%, 20
move user: targets, center, 20
jump user: 300, 20
se: Jump1
wait for movement
face user: target
motion item: user
action animation
action effect
death break
wait: 10
move user: home, 20
face user: forward
jump user: 300, 20
se: Jump1
wait for jump
</target action>

<follow action>
show battle hud
reset zoom: 10
reset camera: 10
clear battle log
</follow action>
<Cooldown: 3>

1 号技能会在选择“攻击”指令时使用。
<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

<target action>
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
move user: targets, front, 20
else
perform start
end
wait for movement
motion attack: user

attack animation: target
wait for animation
action effect
</target action>

description:
魔法
基础的火焰魔法，能够凝聚火焰冲击敌人
name: 火球术
note:
<Custom Regenerate Effect>
if (origin !== target && origin.isAlive()) {
  var damage = target.hp*0.08+origin.mmp*0.08;//目标当前hp8%+施法者最大hp的8%
  var el=target.elementRate(6)
  damage = Math.ceil(damage*el);//计算目标植物抗性
  origin.startAnimation(46);//运行施法者恢复动画
  origin.gainHp(damage);//恢复HP
  origin.startDamagePopup();
  origin.clearResult();
  target.startAnimation(59);
  target.gainHp(-damage);//目标减少HP
if (target && target.isStateAffected(207)) {
              target.gainHp(damage * 3);
      }
  if (target.isDead()) {
    target.performCollapse();
  }
}
</Custom Regenerate Effect>

note:

<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

<target action>
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
move user: targets, front, 20
else
perform start
end
wait for movement
motion attack: user

attack animation: target
wait for animation
action effect
</target action>

immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'

else
perform start
end
wait for movement
motion attack: user

attack animation: target
wait for animation
action effect
</target action>

<Cast Animation: 0> 
Add State 345: user
  // by Ryusa
  // for Pierce Effect
  immortal: targets, true
  opacity not focus: 0, 30
  wait for opacity
  camera focus: user, base, 30
  zoom: 1.5, 10
  wait for zoom
  wait for camera
  motion attack: user
  move user: target, base, 15
  face user: target
  wait for movement
  motion attack: user
  action animation
  move target: backward, 50, 3
  face target: user
  wait for movement
  action effect
  wait for animation
  immortal: targets, false
  motion evade: user
  move user: backward, 60
  face user: target
  wait for movement
  opacity not focus: 100%, 30
  wait for opacity
  reset camera: 30
  zoom: 1, 10
  wait for zoom
  clear battle log
</Target Action>

end
wait for movement
motion attack: user

attack animation: target
wait for animation
action effect
</target action>
